group_1.textLeft: You mean you've just been lookin' for relationship@advice for your underclassman?!

group_1.textRight: Yeah... She has a crush on someone.
She wants to confess her feelings to her childhood@friend.
I don't know much about that sort of thing, though.
I'm not sure what kind of advice to give her...
So I've been looking into some stuff on my own.
Sorry if I gave you the wrong idea...
Anyway, that's why I said you don't have to worry@too much!

group_1.textLeft: Phew... You sure startled me...
Man, I was so confused!
...Is that really all?
You weren't even able to concentrate at our last@debriefing...

group_1.textRight: That's because...
She's a junior in my club who really adores me.
I was desperate to think of a way to help her.
...But still, I can figure it out on my own!@I'm not going to bother you guys with it!

group_1.textLeft: When I said I wanted to help people with their problems,
it was also for our benefit as a group...
It's a fact that your attitude has caused some@misunderstandings around you.
As a result of people seeing you like this@and holding doubts about you,
the group may lose its footing...

group_1.textRight: It's true that in my last mission, I...
I helped the enemy and acted in a way@that could be considered traitorous...
I've been causing a lot of trouble,@and losing everyone's trust.
...You're right, Yuna.@I guess I can't stir up any more problems, huh?

group_1.textLeft: Indeed...
That's why I'd like us to find an answer to your issue@together...
Once we resolve the matter,@you'll be able to focus on your missions again.

group_1.textRight: [chara:302101:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]Huh?!
Wha...

group_1.textLeft: What's with the gawking?

group_1.textRight: ...See, I used to think Yuna was a pretty scary person.

group_1.textLeft: [chara:102201:effect_emotion_joy_0][se:7222_happy]She's a real sweetheart to her friends!
I'm not sure that I'll be able to offer you@relationship advice by myself.
If we get everyone together, we should all be able@to find a solution for you, right?

group_1.textRight: Well...probably, yeah, but...@It's my own personal problem...
I don't want to drag the whole group into it...
And personally, I don't know if now's really the time@to be asking for relationship advice...

group_1.textLeft: You have an important role to play in our revenge@against Kamihama, Sakuya.
If we don't solve your problem, you won't be able to@concentrate in battle.
That would be detrimental to everyone@in Futatsugi City...
Besides, since you're one of us,
it's also our duty to help you out...
That's what friends are for, right...?

group_1.textRight: Yuna...

group_1.textLeft: Now, Hikaru...
Hikaru...?

group_1.textRight: Oh—! Sorry.
I'll give everyone a call right away!
...Hey, Yuna.

group_1.textLeft: What is it...?

group_1.textRight: Don't you think something's up with Hikaru?

group_1.textLeft: ...You noticed, too?
Ever since she checked her phone earlier,@she's seemed a bit absent-minded...

group_1.textRight: And then there's Urara...
She keeps glancing at Hikaru and fidgeting...
You think something's wrong?

group_1.textLeft: ...Most likely...
I'll have to listen to what those two have to say@as well...
But first,
we have some other matters to attend to...
